titleStmt.title: Plaine truth vvithout feare, or, Flattery being a case of conscience tryed at Oxford
titleStmt.author: Wilbee, Amon.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for H.I. and Ro. Smith,

notesStmt.note: A dialogue between Mr. Thrivewell, a citizen, and Mr. Sharpwit a schollar -- cf. caption title, p. [3].
Attributed to Amon Wilbee. cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
